attributes.action: No Road Tax on Older Vehicles
attributes.additional_details: As the rolling 25 year exemption for Road Tax on vehicles was discontinued many years ago it should be time for some update to be carried out, if not 25+ years how about pre 1985. These part of our heritage most of which do few miles on a few days of the year. So if a new Fiat 500 is free why not these vehicles, they may not be fuel efficient but neither have they caused polution from their production for decades
